articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Looks like AltLayer is airdropping $ALT to *qualified*:
- Eigenlayer restakers
- Celestia stakers 
Snapshot has been taken. 
Wouldnt trade or buy the NFTs now either likely snapshot been taken as well.


AltLayer: As thanks to our OG supporters/Alters, we'll be doing ALT token airdrops to OG Badge #NFT holders, @oh_ottie_ #NFT holders. qualified participants of Altitude campaigns, & qualified restakers from @eigenlayer and stakers from @CelestiaOrg. Info 🔜
https://www.binance.com/en/research/projects/altlayer

articles.description:
$SWELL airdrop scheduled for late Q1 (March 31st latest).
$SWELL has gotten even more interesting having recently announced entering the restaking game (-> Eigenlayer).
You earn Pearls by minting and holding $swETH and pearls will be convertible to $SWELL tokens at the TGE.

Until then, here are 5 ways to max your Pearl count:
1️⃣ Stake for 30 Pearls per swETH

3️⃣ Refer frens for 10 Pearls each per swETH

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
🚨 $FRAME airdrop alert 🚨 
If you’ve traded NFTs on Ethereum in the past 2 years you’ll be eligible for a $FRAME airdrop.
Frame is an L2 developed by some top-notch devs focusing on NFTs and gaming applications.
The tokens are non-transferable for now.

Frame: It's time to enter the next chapter of NFTs, together.
Today, we're announcing:
1. Our initial fundraise led by @electriccapital and community members.
2. The initial airdrop of $FRAME, available to anyone whose traded an NFT on ETH the last two years.
Happy Holidays! 🎄🖼️
